data: The great bell of the cathedral chimed musically the hour of six, its vibrant tones mingling with the muffled din and clangor of smaller bells, steam whistles, town clocks and street-car jingle, making itself heard above the roar and rattle of travel over the stone-paved streets of the Forest City.
Tibby: A novel dealing with psychic forces and telepathy
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: science-fiction & fantasy|category: novels
